Title: Embraer Boosts Net Revenue Forecast As Deliveries Set To Increase In 2023
Description: Brazilian planemaker Embraer SA on Friday boosted its net revenue forecast for 2023 as it expects supply chain disruptions to gradually ease and aircraft deliveries to increase.

Title: Two 10-year-old Boeing 787 Dreamliners are already being scrapped
Description: If you're in the market for a pair of lightly used widebody aircraft, you better head to Scotland fast and put in an offer — before two Boeing 787-8s formerly flying for Norwegian Air Shuttle get stripped for parts.
